It has become acceptable in our culture to state 'your truths.' There are truths that have been established and proven in my life and in the lives of other believers. GOD is good, merciful and faithful. GOD is love: that is the TRUTH! May the love of GOD fill your heart.

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   Proverbs 23:23
-   Week 2
    -   John 14:6
-   Week 3
    -   Zechariah 8:16
-   Week 4
    -   Matthew 2:5-6
-   Week 5
    -   John 1:14
